pages.title: Star Tortoise
pages.text: The Indian star tortoise ($(o)Geochelone elegans$()) is a threatened tortoise species native to India, Pakistan and Sri Lanka where it inhabits dry areas and scrub forest.

pages.title: Star Tortoise
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:apple$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
